android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to read from SD Card.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.FLASHLIGHT.description: Allows the application to control the flashlight.

android.permission.CAMERA.description: Allows application to take pictures and videos with the camera. This allows the application to collect images that the camera is seeing at any time.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

com.android.launcher.permission.INSTALL_.description: Allows an application to install a shortcut in Launcher.

android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO.description: Allows application to access the audio record path.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

android.permission.GET_TASKS.description: Allows application to retrieve information about currently and recently running tasks. May allow malicious applications to discover private information about other applications.

android.permission.VIBRATE.description: Allows the application to control the vibrator.

android.permission.KILL_BACKGROUND_PROCE.description: Allows an application to kill background processes of other applications, even if memory is not low.

com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEI.description: Permission for cloud to device messaging.

manifest_analysis.title:
Clear text traffic is Enabled For App
[android:usesCleartextTraffic=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: The app intends to use cleartext network traffic, such as cleartext HTTP, FTP stacks, DownloadManager, and MediaPlayer. The default value for apps that target API level 27 or lower is "true". Apps that target API level 28 or higher default to "false". The key reason for avoiding cleartext traffic is the lack of confidentiality, authenticity, and protections against tampering; a network attacker can eavesdrop on transmitted data and also modify it without being detected.
manifest_analysis.name: Clear text traffic is Enabled For App [android:usesCleartextTraffic=true]

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup=true]

playstore_details.title: Sweet Selfie - Beauty Camera & Best Photo Editor
playstore_details.description:
The best selfie photo editor and beauty camera with all features: face tune, body retouch, blur background, and trendy filters, live stickers and artistic effects.

300,000,000 users worldwide take selfies every day with Sweet Selfie.  Featured by Google Play🏆, top beauty camera and photo editor with makeup, helps you take perfect and sharable selfies with ease, edit beautiful photos, pictures, and videos even boomerang for Facebook, Instagram, Whatsapp, Messenger, TikTok, Wechat, etc.

⭐Selfie Camera with beauty effects⭐

* Pro beauty camera: The Sweet Selfie camera can help you take perfect selfies with ease.

* Snapchat Face filters: Face changer provides 1000+ snapchat funny face changer filters to easily get your face swap or makeovers.

* Photo stickers: Tons of cute photo stickers for you to choose, including emoji photo stickers, dog face filters and so much more photo stickers.

⭐Face Tune - Selfie Editor⭐

* Smooth skin: beauty camera can retouch skin tone by using exclusive skin smoothing makeover tool, which can also bring you perfect face and selfie pictures.

* Teeth whitener: beauty editor with teeth whitening brings out the natural beauty in your smile

* Perfect Eyes: Erase bags and dark circles beneath your eyes, brighten your eyes

* Acne & Pimple remover: remove acnes & pimples with just a tap to make skin problems disappear

* Adjust facial features: slim face, red eye remover, plump up lips, grow a taller nose bridge

⭐Makeup Camera - Essential Tools⭐

* Makeover lips, eyes, brows, teeth, contour, blusher and more instantly

* Try makeovers from glamorous makeup looks by using this Makeup tools

⭐Body Retouch - Reshape Body⭐

* Body editor: With our body shape editor, perfect body shape edited by adjusting your waist, breast, taller, abs and pecs.

* Skin tone changer: Change your skin color/tone to look younger.

⭐Professional Photo Editing⭐

* Blur photo editor: Choose radical and linear blur effect to blur the unwanted part of your image with a tap.

* Crop photo editor: The perfect selfie and photo is just one crop away, tap to resize and trim

* Background Changer: Change your background color or shape to teardrop-shaped, corrugated shape

* Other features: You can adjust the brightness, contrast, vignette, fade, temperature, saturation, sharpen, etc.

⭐Collage Maker & Photo Grid⭐

* Photo collage maker provides tons of free preset templates & layouts

* You can choose Multi-Grid with/without white border or Funny Themed pic collage from our Photo collage maker to arrange your pic collage in freestyle

Additional Features

* Cutout: Background eraser editor can help you eraser the unwanted part of your image and add new background. Besides, you can also adjust photo filters, add texts and various stickers.

* Touch Capture: Just tap the screen and a perfect selfie will show you.

* Selfie Timer built in so you can get off the perfect hands-free shot.

* Multiple face recognition lets you go for the group shot.

Sweet Selfie is a powerful photo editor & pro beauty camera with all features. With Sweet Selfie app, you can remove pimples and acnes, smooth skin, brighten eyes , whiten teeth, change skin tone, add face filters and photo effects, blur photo backgrounds and so much more everything you want by Beauty Camera & Photo Editor. Sweet Selfie can meet all you needs about selfies.

With real-time beauty effects, you can take selfies easily and save it even without editing, and share your selfies to popular social sites like Facebook, Instagram, Whatsapp, Messenger, TikTok, Wechat, etc by one click.

Any questions for Sweet Selfie (Pro photo editor & beauty camera plus) ?

Please contact us.

- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/i.love.sweetselfie/

- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sweetselfie_official/

- Youtube: @Sweet Selfie

- Email: support @ufotosoft.com
